DOC.brief_summary: Conduct a KAP survey before and after intervention and describe the current knowledge, attitudes and behaviors on drink driving in public and analyse the influential factors to provide rational strategies to enhance the awareness on drink driving in public.
DOC.brief_title: The Study of KAP on Drink Driving in Jiangsu Province in China
DOC.criteria: aged 1870, resident for more than 6 months. less than 18 or older than 70, or provisional resident.
